autopay.automatic_payments_description: Automatic {{type}} will be processed on the same day each month. You will be notified by email and/or text 10 days before your payment day. You may get the notification for your next payment provided this change is being made 10 days before the selected payment day.
autopay.dialog_are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to proceed?

disable_automatic_payments_dialog.heading: Disable Automatic {{type}}
disable_automatic_payments_dialog.message: By disabling automatic {{type}}, you will be resuming responsibility for making payments on your account on or before the date when your balance is due.

autopay.error_updating_autopay: You must select a different payment method to update automatic {{type}}.
autopay.ineligible_notice: You are unable to setup automatic {{type}} until you have products or services associated to your account.
autopay.pause_description: will cancel your automatic {{type}} until a predetermined date.

suspend_automatic_payments_dialog.heading: Pause Automatic Payments
suspend_automatic_payments_dialog.message: By pausing automatic payments, you will be resuming responsibility for making payments on your account on or before the date when your balance is due until automatic payments resume.

offer_summary.conditions: Totals due do not include taxes, surcharges, or additional fees. During the credit check process, a deposit may be added to the total amount due today. Pre-orders will be charged to your credit card when items are shipped.

ordering.activation_text_line1: Now that the purchase is complete, just activate Penny. Your mobile service is activated automatically when you insert the SIM card into your mobile phone. You can easily activate your broadband service in the app or on the website when you are ready to get started.
ordering.activation_text_line2: Payment is deducted when you activate your service.
ordering.gdpr_consent_1: Jag samtycker till att Penny behandlar personuppgifter om mig som är s.k. trafikdata, (t.ex. om hur jag använder tjänsten) för att kunna erbjuda en för mig anpassad kundupplevelse och personliga erbjudanden. Hur länge uppgifterna sparas, se
ordering.gdpr_consent_3: Jag kan, när som helst, ta tillbaka samtycket via kundservice eller Penny-appen.
ordering.general_consent_3: samt har tagit del av information
ordering.general_consent_5: och om den behandling av uppgifter som anges i
ordering.legal_address: This will be shipped to your legal address
ordering.mobile_app_text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Mauris condimentum cursus elementum. Suspendisse fermentum, felis ut ornare posuere, sem nulla egestas nibh, vitae.
ordering.order_reserved: Your order was received and all devices have been reserved at the store listed below.
ordering.order_summary_description: Please review your one time and recurring purchases before fulfilling the GDPR consents and moving forward with your purchase.
ordering.penny_play_ad: Watch comics and movies for free for 12 months
ordering.port_in_prompt_body: You can start your number transfer directly here or later in your Penny account during services. If you have Tele2, Comviq or Com Home today the number will be moved immediately so it is good to wait until you have received your SIM card. If you have another operator, it will take about five days to move the number.
ordering.port_in_create_case_failed_heading: There was an error creating your port-in request.
ordering.streaming_ad_text: For all our customers, our streaming service includes Penny Play where you can watch lots of comics and movies for free for 12 months. Read more and activate the service.
ordering.streaming_ad_link_text: Read more and activate our service
ordering.streaming_text: You can now also use our streaming services at
ordering.welcome_ios_text: You can activate Penny Play on our website and after that you can enjoy lots of series and movies directly in the Penny app. As a customer with mobile or broadband, Penny Play is included for 12 months.
ordering.welcome_text_1: Tack för att du valt att bli kund hos oss, hoppas du kommer trivas. Behöver hjälp att komma igång så finns det guider i både app på vår hemsida. Om du skulle behöva en ny router så har vi fixat bra priser hos
ordering.welcome_text_2: .  Eller så kanske du behöver hjälp med att installera eller optimera uppkopplingen så fixar
ordering.welcome_text_play: Glad you chose to add Penny Play. Now a whole world of television, movies and comics is ahead of you. If you need help getting started, there are guides in both our app and our website.

payment_history.zero_state_description_allowance: You have no allowance related transactions which would occur with roaming when roam like home is not applicable. Please go to My Account to add an allowance.

payment_methods.intro_copy: No mess with bills, everything is paid with the card you fill in below. We currently accept Swedish MasterCard and Visa.
payment_methods.intro_copy_loggedin: Here you fill in the information on your debit card. At the moment, Swedish debit and credit cards from MasterCard and Visa work.

settings.failed_payment_confirmation: This product has a failed payment. Please go back to the product screen and resolve the issue in the billing section.
settings.heading: Settings
settings.intro_copy: This is the intro copy that will introduce the user to the setting section. Vestibulum at aliquam tellus. Mauris at sagittis ipsum, sit amet condimentum arcu. Sed viverra tempor diam. Maecenas non nulla lectus. Nullam fermentum odio et convallis faucibus.
settings.pending_activation: You cannot make changes to your account until you have completed first use or pending updates have completed.
settings.play_in_app_redirect: To make changes to Penny Play, you must log in to your Penny account on the web. We know it's a little complicated, but we're working to make it a little easier.
settings.port_number_confirmation: Thank you, we'll get back to you in a few days
settings.port_number_confirm_number: Would you like to proceed with the port-in request for {{portFrom}}?
settings.port_number_description: Enter the number you want to move to Penny.
settings.port_number_disclaimer: Viktigt: Om du beställer en nummerflytt innan du fått ditt Penny SIM-kort finns det in risk att nummerflytten är klar innan du fått ditt SIM-kort. Det kan göra att du inte använda ditt telefonnummer under en period.
settings.port_number_pending: You have a port-in request scheduled for the following:
settings.port_number_cancel_header: Would you like to cancel your port in request?
settings.port_number_cancel_pending: We are attempting to cancel your port in request. Please check back at a later time.
settings.port_number_cancel_success_notification: Your Port-in request has been cancelled.
settings.port_number_update_prompt: You have a port-in request scheduled for {{portInDate}}. If this date is more than one business day away, you may change the date if you would like.
settings.port_number_update_success_notification: Your port-in request has been updated.
settings.port_number_proceed_without_sim_descript: A number move can go fast. If you have not received your Penny SIM card, you may not be able to use your number for a period of time.
settings.port_number_proceed_without_sim_question: Do you want to continue anyway?

port_number_response.001: There is already an order for number transfer for this number.
port_number_response.002: Number part of DDI-range that cannot be ported
port_number_response.003: Number not associated with stated subscriber
port_number_response.005: Number not associated with any subscriber
port_number_response.006: Order cannot be processed due to lack of information
port_number_response.007: Desired time of porting not possible
port_number_response.414: Ett tekniskt fel har uppstött, vanligen försöka igen senare
port_number_response.415: Du verkar ha bindningstid kvar på ditt nummer, kontakta ditt nuvarande operatör.
port_number_response.416: Du verkar inte stå som ägare på det här numret, endast den som står som ägare på numret kan flytta in numret till Penny.
port_number_response.417: Det här numret är inte registrerat på ditt personnummer hos Comviq. Se till att registrera numret på dig, och försök igen.
port_number_response.CABS: Tyvärr kan vi för tillfället inte genomföra nummerflytt från Com Hem/Tele2 Företag. Kontakta din tidigare operatör för mer information.
port_number_response.CBS-Pre: Det här gick jättebra, vi är snart klara.
port_number_response.CBS-Pos: Din nummerflytt är nu klar och det nya numret är registrerat på ditt Penny SIM-kort.
port_number_response.EXTERNAL: Kul att du vill flytta ditt nummer till Penny vi kollar om det går bra och meddelar dig så snart vi vet mer.
port_number_response.PENNY: Numret finns redan hos Penny, och kan därför inte flyttas in.
port_number_response.SIEBEL: Det här gick jättebra, vi är snart klara.

settings.port_number_sim_available: Do you have your Penny SIM card available?
settings.port_number_success_body: Din nummerflytt är nu klar och det nya numret är registrerat på ditt Penny SIM-kort.
settings.port_number_wait_to_port: You can activate your number as soon as you have inserted your Penny SIM card in the phone. If you have lost your SIM card, you can order a new one
settings.port_number_within_regret: Du kan göra en portering tidigast 14 dagar efter ditt köp. När den tiden har gått så tar det bara några dagar att flytta numret. För att det ska gå så smidigt som möjligt kolla gärna att det är du som står som ägare på abonnemanget och att det inte finns någon bindningstid
settings.product_renew_in_process: Please check back to update your product, the product is currently renewing and no updates are allowed.
settings.restore_product_description: Looks like you want to restore your product. That is awesome, click the button and we will get you taken care.
settings.restore_product_notice: Restore your product to make sure it renews on {{endDate}}.
settings.restore_product_summary: You are about to restore your product to {{decisionName}} on {{offerName}}. Your new monthly charge will be {{decisionTotal}} on {{paymentMethod}}.
settings.return_product_are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to return {{name}}?
settings.return_product_confirmation: You have now returned the service.
settings.return_product_confirmation_hardware: If you have hardware, you will receive a return slip sent home.
settings.return_product_description: It looks like something didn't work out with your product. Please select the reason why and submit.
settings.return_product_port_in_progress: Can't place another change request since Port-in is in progress.
settings.return_product_problem: There was a problem returning your product, please use the below link to chat with someone about returning your product
settings.return_product_instructions: Please drop off your equipment to the nearest store.
settings.sim_swap: This will allow you to lock your current SIM and request a new one to be shipped to your legal address.
settings.change_of_service_in_progress: A SIM swap, upgrade/downgrade, or number port-in is in progress on this product. If you have requested a SIM swap, please check your mail for your new SIM card.
settings.successfully_modified_product: You have successfully modified your product.

roaming_details.heading: Roaming
roaming_details.information: As a mobile customer at Penny, you can of course call, mess and surf when you are traveling. Within the EU you have the same price as at home and you can surf up to 12 GB. If you travel outside the EU or want to call abroad from Sweden, you need to refill your Pennypott. You do this easily in the app.
roaming_details.no_roaming_agreement: We got no roaming-agreement with this country.
roaming_details.title: Roaming

save_cart_modal.success_banner_message: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Mauris condimentum cursus elementum. Suspendisse fermentum, felis ut ornare posuere, sem nulla egestas nibh, vitae.

save_cart_prompt.heading: Save Shopping Cart
save_cart_prompt.prompt: You are about to leave the checkout process. Would you like to save your cart so that you may resume shopping at a later time? Any unsaved changes may be lost.

saved_cart_notification.description: You have an offer currently in your cart. To resume configuring your offer, or to check out, view your cart.

search_offers.name: Offers
search_offers.pick_your_penny_description: Penny is a new platform where we've simply gather everything you need in one app. Telecom, broadband, TV & everything you'll need for the best service at a reasonable price.

settings.privacy_settings_description: Here you can change your privacy settings and choose what personal information you want to share with Tele2. The information is saved in order to give you the best customer experience possible. You can withdraw your consent at any time.
settings.privacy_settings_more_info: Read more about our privacy policy.

shop.date_selection_title: Enter the date for the number transfer
shop.date_selection_description: We will then move your number from your current operator to us at Penny, provided that the number is active, has no binding period with another operator and is registered with you.

description.default: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla commodo ultrices magna quis bibendum.
description.bredband: No invoices, no binding times, no hassle. Just a fast broadband. You decide on your subscription and can change at any time, directly in the Penny app.
description.erbjudanden: When you subscribe to both mobile subscriptions and broadband from Penny, we double your monthly surf on your mobile. You decide on your subscriptions yourself and can change and pause them whenever you want, directly in the Penny app.
description.mobil: With Penny, you don't have to deal with invoices and bonding times. You decide on your subscription yourself and can change your monthly surf at any time, directly in the Penny app.
description.benifydeals: With Penny, you don't have to deal with invoices and bonding times. You decide on your subscription yourself and can change your monthly surf at any time, directly in the Penny app.

header.erbjudanden: You get double surf in Mobile

shop.zero_state_description: Purchase or clear the items in your cart to see more offers.

subscriber.invalid_postal_code: Postal code must be 5 or 9 digits in length.
subscriber.maximum_age_error: The birthdate entered exceeds the maximum age.
subscriber.minimum_age_error: The birthdate entered is below the minimum age.
subscriber.name: Name
subscriber.postal_zip_code_format_error: Please enter postal code in format displayed.

ssn_lookup.heading: Tell Us More About You
ssn_lookup.information: You can rest assured that we protect your personal information. They are only used to complete your purchase and to add you as a customer.
ssn_lookup.information_post_lookup: Your contact information will not be disseminated, but will only be used so that we can contact you as a customer.
ssn_lookup.young_error: You must be 18 or older to purchase.

subscriber_notification.balance_due_description: To avoid an interruption in your services please pay your outstanding balance by {{date}}. Thank you.
subscriber_notification.balance_due_title: Your balance of {{balance}} is now due
subscriber_notification.expired_payment_method_description: Update your payment method to be able to edit {{name}}.
subscriber_notification.invoice_available: Your invoice for the billing period ending {{billingPeriodEndDate}} is now available to view.
subscriber_notification.past_due_description: Your account is currently {{days}} days past due. To avoid loss of service, please make a payment to bring your account into good standing.
subscriber_notification.pending_order_message: The service you have ordered is currently awaiting activation. Please allow 24 hours for your account to reflect these changes.
subscriber_notification.pending_order_title: Pending Order - Order placed on {{date}} at {{time}}
subscriber_notification.store_order_message: Your device(s) are being pulled from inventory at {{storeName}}, {{storeAddress}} and will be waiting for you. You will not be charged until pickup.
subscriber_notification.store_order_title: Your device order is ready for pickup.
subscriber_notification.submitted_order_message: Your order has been submitted and is currently {{orderStatus}}. The confirmation number is {{orderNumber}}.

support_request.confirmation_description: Thank you for your inquiry. Your request has been received and a customer service representative will respond as quickly as possible.

empty.description: Please create a request or check out our support section of our website for additional help and information.
empty.elevated_description: Not seeing your issue or need to report something immediately?

support_request.name: Create: {{caseType}}
support_request.remarks_empty: There are no remarks to display at this time.

usage.no_entitlements: There are no entitlements for this service.

usage_overview.charge_incurred_tooltip: A charge of {{amount}} has been incurred due to this usage.
usage_overview.no_usage_details: Please ensure you have the correct service identifier and date selected.
usage_overview.support_text: If you continue to experience issues, you may submit a support request.
